subject: Re: Can we use two different framwork in single test class
msgSnippet: See, if we mock the object using junit how can i mock it again using Mockito in same class? i thought of using the @Before and @After but couldent succeed. do
messageBody:
See, if we mock the object using junit how can i mock it again using Mockito in same class?

i thought of using the @Before and @After but couldent succeed.
do you have any idea how to implement it?
